text: tur malaiyai unkal mel uyartti nam unkalukkuk kotutta (tavrat)tai urutiyutan parrik kollunkal; atai ceviyerrukkollunkal. Enru unkalitam nam vakkuruti vankinom. (Atarku avarkal) nankal ceviyerrom; melum(atarku) maru ceytom enru kurinarkal. Melum avarkal nirakaritta karanattinal avarkal itayankalil kalaikkanrin (pakti) pukattappattatu. Ninkal muhminkalaka iruntal unkalutaiya iman etai kattalaiyitukirato atu mikavum kettatu enru (napiye!) Nir kurum
